aka: Indonesien - Im Einsatz für Sumatras Urwald(德)
Indonésie - Sauver la forêt de Sumatra
trans_title: Indonesien - Im Einsatz für Sumatras Urwald(德)
Indonésie - Sauver la forêt de Sumatra
introduction: From the producers of the critically acclaimed Frontier Borneo series is a new adventure in the wilds of Sumatra, Indonesia, Frontier Sumatr a.Frontier Sumatra tells the incredible story of the people, the animals and the land of Kampar Peninsula in Riau Province, a remote peatland rainforest the size of London. At its heart is Restorasi Ekosistem Riau (RER), an ambitious project that unites community, scientists and industry in the never-ending battle to protect one of Earth’s most important, yet least understood, ecosystems.Premiering on Discovery Channel Asia on Monday, September 20 at 8 p.m. GMT+8, Frontier Sumatra will share the incredible stories of the people, the animals and the land of Kampar Peninsula in Riau Province, a remote peatland rainforest the size of London.[MEET THE RANGERS](https://www.frontiersumatra.com/articles/meet-the-rangers/): Hendrizal, Wahyudi, Roki AnggaraProduced by BEACH HOUSE PicturesGlobal Premiere Discovery Channel Asia
